column1: Art Institute of Chicago//// I spent summers of my teens in art classes at the museum. The Spanish Baroque section is the first time I cried for art. I've spent literally
column2: hundreds of hours of my life in that museum
column3: and I still can't get enough of it
column4: the pieces are so well chosen and these are major works of art that you see reproduced all over the world. Of all the museums in the world
column5: I am in love with this one
column6: mostly because it is one of the symbols of one of my favorite cities in the world
